The photo used to support the claim is a: not an actual image of Brett Kavanaugh in 1982. This was verified by checking the caption and source of the photo.
Getty Images: where the stock photo was found, was only founded in 1995, indicating that the photo could not have been taken prior to that date.
A search for photos of Kavanaugh in Gett: further supporting the fact that the photo is not of Kavanaugh in 1982.
The photo has been used in multiple heal: suggesting that it is a generic image rather than a specific depiction of Kavanaugh.
